milestone.title: v1.0.0
milestone.description: First major release with core features

issues.title: Implement user authentication
issues.body: Add login and registration functionality with JWT tokens

issues.title: Add API rate limiting
issues.body: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse of API endpoints

issues.title: Fix memory leak in cache
issues.body: Cache implementation has a memory leak that causes OOM after 24 hours

issues.title: Add monitoring dashboard
issues.body: Create dashboard to visualize system metrics and health

issues.title: Document API endpoints
issues.body: Write comprehensive API documentation with examples
